data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Sumatera Utara, Indonesia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sumatera Utara, Indonesia

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Sumatera Utara. Through your servants plant 1,926 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 16 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Sumatera Utara, Indonesia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sumatera Utara, Indonesia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 9,630,900 people living in the state of Sumatera Utara.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Malay, Singkil people.
Please, convict the 308,999 believers in Sumatera Utara, Indonesia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: God, guide the 308,999 believers in Sumatera Utara to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Spirit, cause the 308,999 believers in Sumatera Utara to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

location.name: Sumatera Utara
location.people_groups_list: Pakpak Boang, Aneuk Jamee, Lubu, Acehnese, Batak Angkola
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Pakpak Boang (21,000), Aneuk Jamee (74,000), Lubu (55,000), Acehnese (3,966,000), Batak Angkola (1,220,000)
